item.title: Enterprise Cloud Communications Arrives
item.description:
Cloud computing is becoming increasingly popular, and now cloud communications is emerging as a new trend. This means that phone services, data processing, and file storage are all moving to the cloud. A clear sign of this shift is the launch of enterprise-level cloud communication services by major providers like XO Communications. While this seems new, it’s actually a return to the roots of telephony.
